attributes.action: Please make Michael Jackson day a public holiday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael Jackson was an an icon, a singer, a dancer, and a legend. Most importantly, he was a humanitarian, who bought a smile to millions of people across the globe. He was a kind, decent, honest and loving man. Having one day to honour this great person, just doesnt seem enough. The world has lost one of the greatest musicians to ever grace our planet. Having one day in honour of this amazingly talented person seems only fair. One international holiday bringing together millions of people across the world to pay tribute to this angel who was came in the form of Michael Jackson.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
